REMOTE - http://www.ezhome.com/careers/positions

ezhome aims to become the #1 trusted provider of tech-enabled home services. We provide an amazingly better experience using software and data that enable our service personnel to be more effective and efficient. We are pioneering the tech-enabled home services space with a full-stack approach.

ezhome was founded by two serial entrepreneurs and has been growing extremely quickly (multi-million ARR within a year). We've assembled a world class team and have raised significant funding from top-tier investors. We are looking for top talent â€” join us in disrupting the $100 billion home services market!
